item.title: Summary of differences between Ruby on rails and Django ~Basics~
item.description: ##1.First of all I am a beginner who has been programming for 4 months! Since I am studying Ruby on rails and Django, As output, I’d like to write the basic code difference! ! :pencil2::beginner: Since I started learning from rails, What about Django in terms of basic rails? It is written from the perspective of: smile: We hope you find it helpful. (Since I am studying, I plan to add and correct it at any time!
